Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Heterin-2 (natural AMPs; scorpions, arachnids, Chelicerata, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; XXA, UCLL1c; Derivatives: Heterin-2M )

Literature Information.Literature: APD analysis reveals that the sequence  is 91.72% similar toscorpion Pandinin 2.  Active against B. megaterium AB 90008; M. luteus AB2010179 (MIC 415.8-30 uM); S. aureus AB 94004 (MIC 5.6 uM);  E. coli DH5alpha, P. fluorences PF, P. putida PP (MIC 15.8-40 uM), S. enterica AB 2010185 (MIC 15-40 uM). Deletion of the C-terminal KKD markedly increased peptide activity.  Provided by Xiuqing Wang.
Literature Information.Author: Wu S, Nie Y, Zeng XC, Cao H, Zhang L, Zhou L, Yang Y, Luo X, Liu Y.2014
Literature Information.Title: Genomic and functional characterization of three new venom peptides from the scorpion Heterometrus spinifer
